title: The Transcendental Object at the End of Time (2014)
overview: An audio-visual journey through the mind of Terence McKenna.
storyline: An audio-visual journey through the mind of Terence McKenna.
plot: Charles LudlamSamuel BeckettMiguel MihuraWajdi MouawadWalter WykesEugène IonescoDuck Amuck, a 1953 Warner Bros. cartoon, features many of the tenets of Theatre of the Absurd.Arthur AdamovAlexander VvedenskyEdward AlbeeVáclav HavelHarold PinterTom StoppardJean GenetSławomir MrożekAlbert CamusDaniil Kharms
